filters: Optional[List] = ['unbalanced', 'train']¶

Adapter Property that stores a list of string that indicate which patterns should be avoided when the Adapter searches for relavant files.

vltk.adapters.vgqa module¶

class vltk.adapters.vgqa.VGQA(arrow_table, meta_dict=None, split=None, info=None, fingerprint_off=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: vltk.abc.visnadapter.VisnDataset

adjust_imgid(vdset_name, vdset_split)[source]¶

Sometimes the image IDS provided in Vision datasets are repeated in different datasets. If that is the case, implementing this optional function will adjust the image id in aims to appropriately mactch the corresponging dataset try prepending the dataset name

data_info = {'train': {'visualgenome': ['train']}}¶
forward(split, min_label_frequency=9)[source]¶
schema()[source]¶

vltk.adapters.vqa module¶

class vltk.adapters.vqa.VQA(arrow_table, meta_dict=None, split=None, info=None, fingerprint_off=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: vltk.abc.visnlangadatper.VisnLangDataset

static adjust_imgid(imgid, vdset_name, vdset_split)[source]¶

Sometimes the image IDS provided in Vision-Language datasets do not map to the actual image ID in the reffered vision dataset. If that is the case, implementing this optional function will adjust the image id in aims to appropriately mactch the corresponging dataset

data_info = {'test': {'coco2014': ['test']}, 'train': {'coco2014': ['train']}, 'val': {'coco2014': ['val']}}¶
